Class: YTSearch

YTSearch(query)

YTSearch class Represents a YouTube search result object that is returned by the YT Searcher

Constructor

new YTSearch(query)

constructor - Creates a search object with a given query (but does not perform the actual search).
Parameters:
Name Type Description
query string The Search query

Methods

nextPage(newOptionsopt) → {YTSearch}

nextPage - Updates the search object, populating it with data from the next page
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
newOptions Object <optional>
 this.options New search options, if given. Defaults to last used search options.
Source:
  • struct/YTSearch.js, line 109
Returns:
- The Search result, or null if currentPage is already the last page.

YTSearch

prevPage - Updates the search object, populating it with data from the previous page
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
newOptions Object <optional>
 this.options New search options, if given. Defaults to last used search options.
Source:
  • struct/YTSearch.js, line 131
Returns:
- The Search result, or null if currentPage is already the first page.
Type
YTSearch

search(optionsopt, apikeyopt) → {YTSearch}

search - Performs a search with given options.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
options Object <optional>
 {} Optional search options
apikey string <optional>
 The api key to use for this search. If none is specified the last used apikey will be used in the search. If this is the first time search() is invoked on this YTSearch apikey must be given.
Source:
  • struct/YTSearch.js, line 67
Returns:
- The YTSearch object populated with search results.

YTSearch
